node.excerpt: by Albert Carter and Alex Crompton. You can also find this piece on medium. Update, October 15, 2020: The City of Cambridge, MA is showing some interest in this, since it fits well into the Cambridge 2020 Bicycle Plan. If you’re also interested in this, please encourage them to adopt the proposal…

frontmatter.title: A Dutch Import We Can All Love: Bike Points
frontmatter.description: They're cheap, politically easy, and improve people's lives. Find out what they are, how to make them, and how to bring them to the US.
